entry.tran: (肉体或内心的)痛苦，苦难，折磨
entry.def: Suffering is serious pain which someone feels in their body or their mind.

example.ex: They began to recover slowly from their nightmare of pain and suffering...
example.tran: 他们开始从痛苦的梦魇中慢慢恢复过来。

example.ex: It has caused terrible suffering to animals...
example.tran: 那给动物们带来了可怕的灾难。
